Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Is the catastrophe sparked by the Zero-point Reactor 1 an omen that the next phase of evolution is upon us?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kilgore Trout', 3: "Hmm... you realize that evolution always comes with elimination, don't you?", 4: '2'}
{3: "A muffled voice, as though echoing through water, pierces Lilith's ears with a sudden, stinging jolt."}
{3: 'Then a surge of warmth seeps into her ear canals, dragging her Memory back into a seemingly endless void.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Surgeon', 3: "There's a hematoma in the outer ear canal! We're unsure about any intracranial hemorrhage—incise and drain to halt the bleeding!", 4: '1'}
{3: "The doctor's coat is now tattered and stained beyond recognition, polluted by metal shards and splashes of blood."}
{3: 'The voice along the shore fades even further away, and yet she continues to sink—past the sunlit layer, into the twilight depths...'}

{3: 'At the far end of the trench, a silent hospital corridor stretches out. Soft afternoon light—so unlike anything one can find beneath the ocean—envelops the pristine white interior in a gentle glow.'}
{3: "December 25, 2150. The digital clock displays an eerie date—two days after one of Lilith's teenage birthdays."}
{3: 'The man fixes his gaze on the message terminal in his hand, issuing a low, uncertain hum.'}
{3: 'Even with her Memory nearly unmoored from all anchors, her caution remains a matter of pure instinct.'}
{3: "She holds her tongue. In that moment, she realizes the person in front of her isn't even aware she exists."}
{3: 'He keeps his entire focus locked on the terminal right in front of him.'}

{1: 'That memetic corruption <color=#ff4e4eff>▁▃▆▃</color> waits at the far end of the "Bridge", and yet <color=#ff4e4eff>▇▅▂</color> can\'t solve what lies before us.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1145.jpg', 6: '1'}

{1: '<color=#ff4e4eff>▇▅▂▁▂▁▇</color> Need more samples, and <color=#ff4e4eff>▂▄</color> crave more chances...', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1145.jpg', 6: '1'}

{1: 'No matter how the possibilities unfold, you can never obtain <color=#ff4e4eff>▂▄</color> on your own.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1145.jpg', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilith', 3: "From the start... that's the reason you...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She tries to gather her thoughts, but a blinding light tears through her eyelids, jolting every nerve.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Ugh... get your filthy hands off me!'}
{3: 'Her limbs are locked down against cold metal; she can feel the same unforgiving surface under her body.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Surgeon', 3: "The intel we salvaged from Fort Winter isn't complete. We're already pushing the experiment's replication to its very limit.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Surgeon', 3: 'The Tantalum-193 copolymer is highly compatible, but during data transfer, an unknown signal source breaches her Memory.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Surgeon', 3: 'We suspect it stems from those early experiments, leaving behind an irreversible trauma in the brain.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Her eyelashes clamp down on her eyes like iron prison bars, the sharp sting blurring her brain's ability to register what she sees."}
{3: 'Her hearing remains unnervingly sharp, guiding her from the cell to the courtroom where her final judgment awaits.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Madam Monzano', 3: 'Worthless! And I went so far as to make her our Test Subject One!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Madam Monzano', 3: 'Begin the biohazard purge—shut down all life support immediately!', 4: '1'}
{3: "She's staked her very existence on a platinum chip—only to have the haughty dealer cast her aside like worthless scrap?"}
{3: "When it comes down to it, what could that voice possibly know of real pain? She's never even felt the slightest brush of true danger!"}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Ugh... Shut that filthy, festering mouth of yours! Right now!'}
{3: 'A chaotic fury rips from her throat, and with it, a surge of thick, viscous fluid bursts out.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Shut up! SHUT UP!!!! CONTINUE THE SURGERY!!!!'}
{3: 'She struggles against her bindings, but the spikes burrow even deeper beneath her skin with every movement.'}
{3: "Her vision cuts through her lashes, only to retreat back into the depths of her mind as the shadowless lamp's searing heat forces it away."}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'You can make so many decisions for me...'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'But this absolutely will NOT be one of them!!!!!!!'}
{3: 'Pain floods through her, and she feels her consciousness slip away once again.'}
